original_text: But now ye seek to kill me, a man that hath told you the truth, which I have heard of God: this did not Abraham.
korean_text: 지금 하나님께 들은 진리를 너희에게 말한 사람인 나를 죽이려 하는도다 아브라함은 이렇게 하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But now ye seek to kill me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 너희는 나를 죽이려고 하니

sentences.original_text: a man that hath told you the truth
which I have heard of God
